      • generateExpectList

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateExpectList(java.util.regex.Pattern expect,
                                                                        java.util.regex.Pattern next)
        Generate a list for pre, post, warn, and error assertions
        Parameters:
        expect - what assertion list to make
        next - what token to stop at
        Returns:
        an list of the lines under an assertion

      • expect

        private static void expect(java.util.regex.Pattern pattern)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Asserts that a pattern was matched last by the scanner
        Parameters:
        pattern - the pattern to match
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the pattern does not match the last token scanned
